drupalNodeEvent.title: Anxious China: Inner Revolution and Politics of Psychotherapy

field_description.processed: The breathless pace of China’s economic reform has brought about deep ruptures in socioeconomic structures and people’s inner landscape. Faced with increasing market-driven competition and profound social changes, more and more middle-class urbanites are turning to Western-style psychological counseling to grapple with their mental distress.
